title: 4 people killed and 5 others wounded in shooting at Kansas City bar
text:
Kansas City, Kansas — Authorities say a gunman entered a Kansas City, Kansas, bar and shot nine people, fatally wounding four.

KSHB-TV reports that officers were called Sunday at 1:30 a.m. to the Tequila KC Bar for a shooting.

Police said someone entered the bar and opened fire. Four people were shot dead inside the bar. Five others were taken to a hospital in stable condition for treatment.

No one has been arrested in the shooting. Authorities do not know if there is more than one shooter. The motive for the shooting is also unknown.

Kansas City, Kansas, police are investigating the shooting and gave brief details on their Twitter account. The federal Bureau of Alcohol, Tobacco, Firearms and Explosives also said it was on the scene to investigate.
description: Four people were shot dead inside the bar, and five others were taken to a hospital in stable condition for treatment
